title:
R-matrix for the XX spin chain at the special imaginary value of
  staggered magnetic field
abstract:
It is pointed, that the $16\times16$ Hamiltonian density matrix,
corresponding to XX spin chain in a staggered magnetic field, satisfies the
Reshetikhin condition as well, as the two higher ones. All of them are
necessary for the existence of the corresponding $R$-matrix. At the special
imaginary value of the staggered field, the $R$-matrix is obtained explicitly.
It is shown that the corresponding Hamiltonian has purely imaginary spectrum.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
